trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from one data type to another for use by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir et typen konverteringsprogram for å konvertere data for en bildeindeksen til og fra en datatype til en annen for bruk av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om typen konverteringsprogrammer i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basisklasse og [slik: implementere et konverteringsprogram av typen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a TreeViewImageIndexConverter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Vanligvis, oppretter du ikke har en forekomst av en TreeViewImageIndexConverter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>metoden for <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se eksemplene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basistabellen klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Access the TreeViewImageIndexConverter class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Få tilgang til klassen TreeViewImageIndexConverter via <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value object to a 32-bit signed integer object.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer angitt verdi-objekt til et 32-biters heltall med fortegn-objekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to provide locale information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>Angi nasjonale innstillinger.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the specified destination type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til den angitte måltypen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en kontekst som format, som kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne typen konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren eller egenskaper for denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that provides locale information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som gir informasjon om nasjonale innstillinger.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert, typically an index represented as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Objekt for å konvertere, vanligvis en indeks som er representert som en <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to, often a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Typen konvertere til ofte <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av standard indeksverdier for bildelisten knyttet til den angitte format konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en kontekst som format, som kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne typen konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren eller egenskaper for denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid index values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>som inneholder et standard sett med gyldige verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen bildelisten, inneholder denne samlingen ett enkelt objekt med verdien -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is valid in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> er gyldig i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Som implementert i denne klassen, denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is valid in the standard values collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> er ugyldig i samlingen standardverdier; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
